text:
I’m trying to set up a new website in 2 languages
I have a pb with URL translation
In my Navbar : URL are well translated
In my Footer : URL are not translated

Ex in this page <https://www.victanis.com/secteurs/testing-inspection-certification> (basis in French)
NAV BAR
Mon Secteur - Testing are redirecting to <https://www.victanis.com/secteurs/testing-inspection-certification>

FOOTER
Mon Secteur - Testing are redirecting to <https://www.victanis.com/secteurs/testing-inspection-certification>


In the english version (<https://www.victanis.com/en/sectors/testing-inspection-certification-tic>)
NAV BAR
My Sector - Testing are redirecting to <https://www.victanis.com/en/sectors/testing-inspection-certification-tic>

BUT FOOTER
My Sector - Testing are redirecting to <https://www.victanis.com/secteurs/testing-inspection-certification>

It’s strange because String Translation is OK but not the URL Translation...
Any Idea ?
Can I embed a gallery into a custom module?
wo’nt let me. maybe I need more optiosn setup for it though
